item.name: Battery charge %
item.description: The remaining battery capacity expressed in tenths of percent of full capacity

item.name: Battery count
item.description: Number of external batteries connected to the UPS

item.name: Battery count (bad)
item.description: Number of external battery packs connected to the UPS that are defective

item.name: Battery temperature
item.description: The current internal UPS temperature expressed in tenths of degrees Celsius

item.name: Battery time running
item.description: The elapsed time since the UPS has switched to battery power

item.name: Battery voltage
item.description: The actual battery bus voltage in tenths of Volts

item.name: Device manufactured
item.description: The date when the UPS was manufactured in mm/dd/yy (or yyyy) format

item.name: Input frequency
item.description: The current input frequency to the UPS system in tenths of Hz

item.name: Output current (Phase-1)
item.description: The output current in 0.1 amperes drawn by the load on the UPS, or -1 if it's unsupported by this UPS.

item.name: Output current (Phase-2)
item.description: The output current in 0.1 amperes drawn by the load on the UPS, or -1 if it's unsupported by this UPS.

item.name: Output current (Phase-3)
item.description: The output current in 0.1 amperes drawn by the load on the UPS, or -1 if it's unsupported by this UPS.

item.name: Output frequency
item.description: The current output frequency of the UPS system in tenths of Hz

item.name: Output load %
item.description: The current UPS load expressed in tenths of percent of rated capacity

item.name: Output load (Phase-1)
item.description: The output load in VA, or -1 if it's unsupported by this UPS

item.name: Output load (Phase-2)
item.description: The output load in VA, or -1 if it's unsupported by this UPS

item.name: Output load (Phase-3)
item.description: The output load in VA, or -1 if it's unsupported by this UPS

trigger.name: High ambient temperature
trigger.description: UPS ambient temperature is above normal
